title: How to Embed an Image into a Yahoo Email

steps.title: Click the Compose button to create a new message.
steps.content: Click the Compose button to create a new message. Alternatively, you can click the Reply icon (the back arrow) at the top of an existing message if you want to reply.

steps.title: Browse to the image you want to send.
steps.content: Browse to the image you want to send. For example, if you're using a Mac, you can click the Finder icon on the Dock (the two-toned smiley face), and then click the folder that contains your image. On Windows, you can press Windows key + E to open File Explorer, then double-click the folder containing your image to open it.

steps.title: Once you let go of the mouse button, the image will appear in the message.
steps.content: Once you let go of the mouse button, the image will appear in the message. If you find it difficult to drag the image, you can just right-click the file name (use Ctrl + Click on a Mac) and select Copy , then right-click the email message and select Paste .
